title: Station 0001 Water Flow
creator: https://sedimark.eglobalmark.com/ecosystem/participant-egm
description: This is a dataset that contains water flow data from hydrometric station 0001
license:
This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/4.0/
endpointDescription: A dataset endpoint providing water flow data in CSV and JSON formats.
processingSteps: Outlier detection and data normalization using Python scripts.

title: Station 0002 Air Quality
creator: https://sedimark.eglobalmark.com/ecosystem/participant-envirodata
description: This dataset contains air quality measurements from monitoring station 0002.
license:
This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
endpointDescription: An endpoint offering air quality data in JSON and XML formats.
processingSteps: Data aggregation and index calculation using R scripts.

title: Station 0003 Soil Moisture
creator: https://sedimark.eglobalmark.com/ecosystem/participant-agritech
description: This dataset provides soil moisture levels from agricultural monitoring station 0003.
license:
This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
endpointDescription: An endpoint for soil moisture data in CSV and GeoJSON formats.
processingSteps: Soil data extraction and interpolation using machine learning algorithms.

title: Station 0004 Wind Speed
creator: https://sedimark.eglobalmark.com/ecosystem/participant-meteorology
description: This dataset captures wind speed measurements from meteorological station 0004.
license:
This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
endpointDescription: An endpoint offering wind speed data in CSV and NetCDF formats.
processingSteps: Data smoothing and statistical modeling using MATLAB scripts.

title: Station 0005 Precipitation
creator: https://sedimark.eglobalmark.com/ecosystem/participant-climatewatch
description: This dataset contains precipitation data from weather station 0005.
license:

endpointDescription: An endpoint for precipitation data in JSON and XLSX formats.
processingSteps: Precipitation data calibration and visualization using Python scripts.
